item.title: Edwin Feulner, ‘Heritage Foundation’s George Washington,’ Dies at 83
item.description: As co-founder and longtime head of the conservative Washington think tank, he picked policies and staffers for G.O.P. presidents from Reagan to Trump.

item.title: Driver Crashes Into San Jose Post Office, Igniting Fire
item.description: A man was arrested in connection with the crash on suspicion of arson, officials said. No injuries were reported.

item.title: Trump Urges Washington and Cleveland Sports Teams to Revert to Native American Names
item.description: The president threatened to block a deal for the Washington Commanders’ new stadium if the team did not bow to his demand.

item.title: Canceling ‘The Late Show’ Is Bad News for Late-Night TV, not Stephen Colbert
item.description: The art form was already in decline; this may hasten its demise. But don’t fret about the host. His talents are better showcased elsewhere.

item.title: Dozens Are Killed at Aid Site Near Border, Gaza Health Officials Say
item.description: The shootings took place after thousands of Palestinians gathered in the hope of getting humanitarian aid from U.N. trucks entering the Gaza Strip.
